Title: Provides that the New York state energy research and development authority shall provide information to residential and commercial consumers on renewable energy technology incentive and affordability programs
Summary: Provides that the New York state energy research and development authority shall provide information to residential and commercial consumers regarding renewable energy technology incentive and affordability programs through a variety of methods, including brochures, posters, social media, television ads, and public ambassadors.
LawCode: Amd ยง1912, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the provision of information relating to renewable energy technologies and programs
